data.eml:eml: Polysertularella polyseriata, a new genus and species of hydroid (Hydrozoa, Leptothecata, Sertulariidae) from the Sea of Okhotsk

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Antsulevich, Alexander (2011): Polysertularella polyseriata, a new genus and species of hydroid (Hydrozoa, Leptothecata, Sertulariidae) from the Sea of Okhotsk. Zootaxa 3107: 59-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202210
